WorkItem.Description:
I have an Excel file which was created using by another software using OpenXml SDK. 
When I read this file I get an empty dataset.
It seems that the code is using Name property in in XmlReader instead of LocalName.

Regards,
Parashar
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to read files created by OpenXml SDK

Comments.Message:
Can you attach an example spreadsheet that has this issue?

Thanks
Ian

Here is the sample file which is not working correctly.

Regards,
Parashar
I have a solution for this case. Attached are the changed files. Will try to upload to the repository.
Resolved with changeset 82641: Switch to using LocalName rather Name and being NamespaceUri aware. Also, can cope with not having dimension element

Perfect timing on that patch. I had just got to the point where I had a populated table but with empty cells due to inlinestr.

Please test latest code on your spreadsheet. It should work ok now.
